description.name: AzamPay Payment Gateway
description.tagline: AzamPay  is the #1 most scalable payment gateway in Tanzania and widely used to acquire consumer payments in the media, ecommerce and hospitality sector.
description.long: AzamPay WHMCS Plugin 1.0 is the most convenient and secure no-code integration to accept all mobile money payments. Get connected with millions of customers of AzamPesa, Airtel Money, Halotel, and TigoPesa to transact on your marketplace.
